column5: Dutchies has been the best for over 15 years.. they have changed hands in the past few years, but the service , has stayed the same with quality service and a friendly smile.... not to mention the (call ahead) stocking of our favorite cold beer , that is always ready for us to load.
who owns dutchies now? last i knew i thought it was a family from iowa.
I remember when the original "Dutchie" ran the place(1960's).Anybody else remember him?

The new owners are from Iowa , I believe the wife/mother and daughter run it most of the summer.. the previous guy (not sure if he was dutchie)had been there at least 10-11 Years and he and his wife ran it...again great people... in my book they have been A #1 for many years.

the original owner,s name was holdstrom and they built the first store. dutchie [jan lowman] built the new building. he was a proper *** and still is. it has changed hands about 5 or 6 times since then.
I think I run in there for something everyday of the trip.
no dutchies open year round yet.
Ya Dutchies ia a great little store. Why are so many lodges and places like Dutchies owned by Americans? You would think the Canadians would own those businesses
We have always stopped at Dutchies for licenses and beer! When the exchange rate is lower, I pick up some Cubans too!
Is Dutchies in Perrault Falls open year round? If not does anyone know when it opens? Always love stopping in there when fishing on Perrault Lake.

No, they do not keep the store open year round. In the past it seems like the store opens about a week or so before the walleye opener (usually with some shorter hours at first) and then the regular summer schedule kicks in.Give Rikki a call at Skyline Lodge to confirm. 877-452-2809.
may 1 to the end of october
I really like this place. The rainbow store down the road is a nice place as well with a very friendly staff!
Love Dutchies Where is Rainbow store?
Rainbow Point Store is located at Rainbow Point Camp and is about a 1/4 mile North of Dutchies on the East side of the road. Also a nice store to shop at.
Both are very good stops with a great staff. I believe Rainbow sells licenses as well.if anyone on here works at either, send me a message. I have few questions about the stores.

Dutchies is a great place!!! Rikki let us use their phone for over an hour when VISA wouldn't allow us to use our credit card in Canada.......they thought it was stolen and put a high level hold on it. Also have beer at a good price.
Talked to Rikki this morning, she plans to open May 10th.
